the speakers are really loud but they

now for those of you wondering if you

storage

I personally don't need more than 128

moving on to the software experience I

plus now battery life on the 7 Pro is

was able to push it to around you know 6

day
I could extend it to a day-and-a-half

case scenario I can certainly say it's

you're completely you know I mean why

would you go for this phone in the first

it just doesn't make any sense and
